trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_SEQ_00<tab>Hremfing has a secret message for you.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_SEQ_01<tab>It seems a young fellow named Wilred wants a word with you in private. Make your way to the designated meeting point, a rocky area north of the settlement.

TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_SEQ_02<tab>Somewhat predictably, the rendezvous turns out to be a trap. Wilred and his cronies fall upon you, but you succeed in overpowering them. Question Wilred and learn of his agenda.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_SEQ_03<tab>Wilred manages to give you the slip, but not before mentioning a plan to bring down the Empire. Gundobald will want to know of this.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_SEQ_04<tab>Gundobald is troubled to learn that Wilred and his companions will stop at nothing for their plan. What could the young ones possibly mean to do?
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_TODO_00<tab>Rendezvous with Wilred.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_TODO_01<tab>Question Wilred.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_TODO_02<tab>Report to Gundobald.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_HREMFING_000_000<tab>Hey, adventurer. You done talking with the old bear?
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_HREMFING_000_001<tab>I've got a message for you from Wilred. Lad's something of a leader among the young ones here.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_HREMFING_000_002<tab>He's impressed that you've won over Gundobald, and wants a word with you. Says he'll be waiting over at the craggy area north of here.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_010<tab>Thanks for coming, friend. 'Tis no ordinary outsider who can gain the trust of the old bear. That's why I wanted to meet you, to discuss something in private.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_011<tab>Tell me...why are you snooping about? Did the Empire send you? Or someone else?
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_012<tab>Coeurl got your tongue? Hmph, no matter. Whoever it is you work for, your meddling ends here. Get <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_020<tab>I won't let you foil our plan!
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_DUMMY_000_030<tab>(Defeat Ala Mhigan youths.)
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_040<tab>Y-You're stronger than you look...
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_041<tab>This changes nothing! Threaten us, beat us bloody all you like...but nothing short of death can make us give up our fight!
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_WILRED_000_042<tab>We're going to obtain the power to bring down the Empire, and with it we'll reclaim our homeland!
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_GUNDOBALD_000_050<tab>Attacked by Wilred and his cronies!? That they would go to such lengths for the sake of this plan of theirs...
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_GUNDOBALD_000_051<tab>Left to their own devices, the young fools are like to harm others, if not themselves. We must uncover their agenda and put an end to this madness.
TEXT_GAIUSA705_00778_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
